price: 14. Waxayna igu heystaan denbi (dil aan geystey ah), sidaas darteed waxaan ka cabsan inay i dilaan.
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ عَلَيَّ ذَنۢبٞ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقۡتُلُونِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walahum ʿalayya dhanbun fa-akhāfu an yaqtulūni
